backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with user profiles, personal accounts, payments, platform connections, currencies, and transactions, including access control and comparison helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a migration that adds password and NID fields to PersonalAccount by transforming stored records.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, and test IDs documenting password and NID updates to PersonalAccount and UI validation requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files, covering styling, routing, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack router, routes, theme provider, and global toast notifications.
Shows authenticated user info with dropdown options for personal account navigation and logout.
frontend/src/components/brand/ShanjuLogo: Renders the Shanju logo with a fallback text badge if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/integrations/Con: Form for creating platform connectors with validation, API submission, and toast feedback.
Displays a list of connectors with platform labels and allows deleting connectors via confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the top navigation header with the brand logo and authentication status.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with route protection, header, navigation bar, and content outlet.
frontend/src/components/payments/CreditC: Implements a credit card payment form with validation and simulated processing.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays payment details, status, role info, and allows status updates and sharing the payment link.
Form for creating a new payment request with validation and submission handling.
Renders two buttons for selecting card or PayPal payments and calls onSelect with the chosen method.
Displays a filterable table of payments with status badges, role calculation, and navigation actions.
Shows a badge with label and style based on a payment status value.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayPalB: Shows a PayPal payment option that simulates redirect and completion.
frontend/src/components/payments/SimpleC: Generates a simple text-based CAPTCHA and verifies user input before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for entering and saving a userâ€™s name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/wallet/AddMoneyF: Form for funding a wallet using card or bank methods with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/wallet/CashOutFo: Form for withdrawing funds to various external providers with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/wallet/SendMoney: Form for sending money to another principal with validation and transfer submission.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WalletBal: Displays the user's wallet balances with loading skeletons and formatted currency output.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WalletHis: Renders the user's transaction history with icons, status badges, and sorted timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectors.ts: Provides hooks to list, fetch, create, update, and delete platform connectors using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPrincipal.t: Returns the authenticated user's non-anonymous principal or null.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, login flow, stored identities, and context access.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Offers hooks to list, fetch, create, and update user payments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersonalAccount.ts: Handles fetching and saving the caller's personal account data with helpers for normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to get and save the caller's user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Provides React Query hooks for wallet balance, transaction history, and mutations for internal transfers, adding money, and cashing out. Includes error handling and invalidation of related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with a warm color palette. Applies base styling including global font and border utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers. Imports global CSS and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePaymentPage.tsx: Displays a form for creating a new payment request. Provides a simple layout with title and PaymentForm component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows payment statistics, profile setup alerts, and payments table after loading user account data. Provides navigation shortcuts to create payments and edit personal account.
frontend/src/pages/IntegrationsPage.tsx: Allows users to create and manage e-commerce integrations. Displays forms and tables for connectors within styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Renders a 404 page with navigation back to dashboard or sign-in depending on authentication. Uses styled card UI for error messaging.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentDetailsPage.ts: Loads and displays details for a single payment based on URL ID. Handles loading, errors, and provides navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentHistoryPage.ts: Shows a full table of all payment requests. Provides a simple header and embeds the PaymentsTable component.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalAccountPage.t: Manages viewing and editing of the user's personal account with form validation and save operations. Includes wallet balances, history, and money transfer forms.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPaymentPage.tsx: Public-facing payment page allowing users to complete a payment via card or PayPal with captcha verification. Handles payment status display, completion flow, and invalid or unavailable links.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign-in page that triggers Internet Identity login, handles errors, and redirects authenticated users; shows profile setup modal when needed.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint amounts in cents into currency strings using Intl.NumberFormat with a fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/walletCurrency.ts: Converts backend currency variants to codes/labels and formats or parses amounts between display and smallest units.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme settings, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing existing features, new feature requests, and metadata for the Password and NID requirement project.
